I have built a mark 3 ssto and I am trying to land it on the mun but when I try to make the nose turn down it goes up. How do I fix this?

Edited February 17, 2020 by Despacito2

Sounds like you may have changed the vessels control point from the cockpit to a docking port. Try select the cockpit and select “Control from here.”

The other possibility is that you are in docking mode still and the controls are set for linear and not rotation.
